local_intent: Perceive red plate and move end-effector to 5cm above it to prepare for placement
assumptions: Red plate is detectable from current viewpoint
End-effector can reach 5cm above red plate without collision
MoveAbove offset 0.05 is an acceptable clearance for subsequent lowering
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase step from GLOBAL_BT: detects red plate and executes MoveAbove with offset_z=0.05 before lowering and placement.
